name: Publisearch
description: In Publisearch, we are experts on key topics for Internet success: marketing and search engine optimization like google, web design, e-commerce, online advertising, e-mail advertising and social networking. Our staff and our culture is our most active important. Therefore, Publisearch is composed of people with a focus on results, talent, leadership, positive attitude, entrepreneurs and passion for their work.
